name: LD47 - Hiccup Time
description:
Search for the four ingredients to make an antidote toa  potion that went wrong. Watch out for monsters, they will really make your life hard.Controls:
  • Move: WASD, Arrows
  • Action: E, Enter

* We know about enemies bug. Again, Avoid them!

Tip: Don't try rush the game, go slow!
